name: Unchosen (256)
description:
Unchosen is choise based 2D action-rpg survival game, player fight with endless slime army. There are choise tokens on the map that allow us to choose power-ups. Each selected buff increases power, while the unselected decreases its power.

This game developed in HoBI'22 online GameJam competition. Theme was very choice is a renunciation.
